name: Medusa
description: A cursed humanoid with a head full of venomous snakes instead of hair, notorious for its petrifying gaze.
memorable: Can petrify foes instantly with a glance, turning them to stone.
goals: Often found in ancient ruins or hidden lairs, surrounded by petrified victims and treasures; uses cunning and deception to control encounters.
relations: May have connections with other monstrous serpents or creatures drawn to dark places.
strengths: Combination of stealth, agility, and the petrifying gaze provides significant battlefield control.
weaknesses: Somewhat reliant on its gaze; vulnerable if caught off guard or overwhelmed.
attacks: Uses venomous snake hair and longbow for ranged and melee attacks, delivering piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Petrifying Gaze can instantly turn creatures to stone if they fail a saving throw.
equipment: May wield weapons such as shortswords or bows.
senses: Possesses a passive perception score of 15, enhancing its scouting and ambush capabilities.
skills: Has proficiency in deception, insight, perception, and stealth, with high stealth capabilities.
additional_information: Snake hair attack delivers poison damage along with piercing damage.
Monstrosity Resilience protects against exhaustion and frightened conditions.
Snake Friend ability allows communication with snakes, which are immune to its gaze.
test_queries: cursed creature with snake hair and petrifying gaze
medium monstrosity that turns foes to stone
stealthy monster with deadly poisonous attacks
creature residing in ancient ruins with venomous snakes
agile humanoid with horrifying petrifying abilities
